entries.meaning:
(mathematics) A function 
  
    
      
        ϕ
      
    
    {\displaystyle \phi }
  
 such that, for a given linear operator 
  
    
      
        D
      
    
    {\displaystyle D}
  
, 
  
    
      
        D
        ϕ
        =
        λ
        ϕ
      
    
    {\displaystyle D\phi =\lambda \phi }
  
 for some scalar 
  
    
      
        λ
      
    
    {\displaystyle \lambda }
  
 (called an eigenvalue).
